thread.title: Consumer spending picking up, gasoline prices a burden

title: Consumer spending picking up, gasoline prices a burden
text:
Consumer spending picking up, gasoline prices a burden 2:18pm EDT - 01:05
U.S. retail sales rose moderately in April as rising gasoline prices cut into discretionary spending, but consumer spending appeared on track to accelerate. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
U.S. retail sales rose moderately in April as rising gasoline prices cut into discretionary spending, but consumer spending appeared on track to accelerate. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
